---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This `package.json` file defines the configuration and metadata for the `mkdirp-classic` npm package. It is a mirror of the `mkdirp` package version 0.5.2, providing the same functionality for creating directories recursively.

## Symbols

### Package Information
#### Description
The package information includes the name, version, and description of the `mkdirp-classic` package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| name | "mkdirp-classic" | The name of the package |
| version | "0.5.3" | The current version of the package |
| description | "Mirror of mkdirp 0.5.2" | A brief description of the package's purpose |

### Main Entry Point
#### Description
Specifies the main entry point for the package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| main | "index.js" | The primary JavaScript file that will be loaded when the package is required |

### Dependencies and DevDependencies
#### Description
Lists the runtime dependencies and development dependencies of the package. In this case, both are empty objects, indicating no external dependencies.

### Repository
#### Description
Provides information about the source code repository for the package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| type | "git" | The type of version control system used |
| url | "https://github.com/mafintosh/mkdirp-classic.git" | The URL of the Git repository |

### Author
#### Description
Specifies the author of the package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| author | "Mathias Buus (@mafintosh)" | The name and GitHub username of the package author |

### License
#### Description
Indicates the license under which the package is distributed.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| license | "MIT" | The package is licensed under the MIT License |

### Bugs
#### Description
Provides a URL for reporting issues related to the package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| url | "https://github.com/mafintosh/mkdirp-classic/issues" | The URL for the issue tracker on GitHub |

### Homepage
#### Description
Specifies the URL for the package's homepage.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| homepage | "https://github.com/mafintosh/mkdirp-classic" | The URL of the package's main GitHub repository page |

## Dependencies
This package does not have any external dependencies or devDependencies listed in the `package.json` file.
